snippet: The ABC News star will end her career on May 16, with a two-hour special on prime time.
abstract: Barbara Walters is ending her long, successful and frequently groundbreaking television career with two-hour special on ABC, coinciding with her final appearance on talk show she created, The View.
lead_paragraph: The ABC News star will end her career on May 16, with a two-hour special on prime time.

headline.main: ABC Announces Barbara Walters Sign-Off Date
headline.print_headline: Walters to Say Farewell on May 16
